es.ubu.XRayDetector.utils

Class Graphic

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • es.ubu.XRayDetector.utils.Graphic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Graphic
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class draws the graphics on a panel and handles mouse listeners for the selection of regions of interest.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
